page.description: Returns a pointer to the object with focus's container.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.GETACTIVEOBJPARENT()returns a pointer to the container of the object that has focus. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
